ygData.subject: Re: My skull of Jhen'Tra looks like a Barbie(tm) Doll!
ygData.msgSnippet: It was not intended to look like the Doll, according to Veriant they are fixing this in the next release to look more like a skull. ... From: John Hogan
ygData.messageBody:
It was not intended to look like the Doll, according to Veriant they are
fixing this in the next release to look more like a skull.


----- Original Message -----
From: John Hogan <johnhogan@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 9:13 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] My skull of Jhen'Tra looks like a Barbie(tm) Doll!


> From: John Hogan <johnhogan@...>
>
> I appreciate Verant making changes to wizard graphics, however, making a
> skull look like a Barbie doll is, IMHO, worse than the small bag it used
> to look like. I'm sure it was a quick and easy change since the used
> the same graphic from the totems, but come on.
>
> Just my rant.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
